'''Fate's Yearning Perfume''' is a [[Quest Item]] made by [[Ying'er]] during the {{Quest|Three Poignant Perfumes}}. Ying'er says this perfume has a gentle but lingering fragrance, something something like the dusk mist, and it's a favorite of mature ladies.
